N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6000.5 - Reasonable accommodations

State Regulations

It shall be the affirmative responsibility of each
local police agency to assess the type(s) of reasonable accommodations which
may be necessary to allow the candidate to perform the essential functions of a
police officer candidate for such agency and to provide such necessary
reasonable accommodations to a qualified candidate with a disability, provided
however, that nothing herein shall be construed to require the provision of
reasonable accommodations if doing so will impose an undue hardship on the
employing agency or a direct threat to the safety of himself/herself or
others. Notes
